mapper.select:
select a.PERSONID,b.NERVEID,LOGTIME, PARA3,OPID,OPNAME,COMMENTS,VALID from WEBTV.EB_PERSON_OP_LOG a inner join WEBTV.eb_mobile_reg_log b on a.personid=B.PERSONID where OPTYPE = 42 and a.logtime>=#{sDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and a.logtime<=#{eDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
select NERVEID,NEXTVISITTIME,to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') as SDATE from WEBTV.EB_MOBILE_REG_LOG where nextvisittime is not null and to_char(NEXTVISITTIME,'YYYYMMDD')>=to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT distinct b.NerveId as PERSONID,a.PERSONID as NERVEID,a.OLDKEEPERID,a.NEWKEEPERID,a.LOGTIME,a.OLDKEEPERGID,a.OPTYPE ,a.NEWKEEPERGID,a.COMMENTS,a.OLDKEEPERNAME,a.NEWKEEPERNAME,a.VALID,c.type as FROMWHERE,b.DOMAIN,b.FINISHTIME FROM WEBTV.EB_PERSON_KEEPER_LOG a INNER JOIN WEBTV.EB_MOBILE_REG_LOG b on a.PersonId=b.PersonId LEFT JOIN WEBTV.TV_AGENTNAME2DOMAIN c on c.domain = b.domain WHERE a.OPTYPE=10 and a.LogTime>=#{sDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and a.LogTime<=#{eDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

select A.PERSONID ,NVL(max(CASE WHEN A.CUSTESTIMATE='B0' THEN LOGTIME ELSE NULL END),0) as B0 ,NVL(max(CASE WHEN A.CUSTESTIMATE='B1' THEN LOGTIME ELSE NULL END),0) as B1 from ( SELECT A.PERSONID,A.CUSTESTIMATE,TO_CHAR(max(A.LOGTIME),'YYYYMMDD') as logtime FROM webtv.EB_PERSON_PRESALE_LOG a inner join ( select a.PERSONID,min(a.LOGTIME) as logTime from WEBTV.EB_PERSON_KEEPER_LOG a WHERE a.OPTYPE=10 and a.LogTime>=#{sDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and a.LogTime<=#{eDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY a.PERSONID ) b on a.PersonId=b.PersonId and a.LOGTIME<=b.LOGTIME WHERE a.custestimate in ('B0','B1') group by A.PERSONID,A.CUSTESTIMATE ) a GROUP BY a.PERSONID
SELECT TO_DATE(YEARMONTH, 'yyyy-MM') as qDate FROM (SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(CREATETIME,'YYYY-MM') AS YEARMONTH FROM WEBTV.EB_MOBILE_REG_LOG A ) ORDER BY YEARMONTH

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PersonId, Nerveid , KEEPERID , CUSTESTACT1 , createtime, finishTime, firstalloctime, A0, Bplus, B0, B1, B2, B3, preallocgid , PRESALETYPE, TYPE, Bought, KEEPERGID, FromWhere, Domain FROM WEBTV.EB_MOBILE_REG_LOG A WHERE PERSONID>#{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND (KEEPERGID <> 1 or B1>0 or B2>0 or B3>0 or Bplus>0) ORDER BY PERSONID ASC ) a WHERE ROWNUM<=#{rowCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT KEYWORD,DOMAIN,MATCHLEVEL ,ADDPERSON,ADDTIME,MODIFYPERSON ,MODIFYTIME,TYPE FROM WEBTV.TV_AGENTNAME2DOMAIN a

SELECT USERID, GROUPID, CNAME, TO_CHAR(STATDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as STATDATE , CALLOUT, CALLIN, CALLTV, TOTAL, CALLOUTRCV, CALLINRCV, CALLTVRCV, CALLOUTGIV, CALLINGIV, CALLTVGIV, RCV, GIV, NETCALLOUT, NETCALLIN, NETCALLTV, NETTOTAL, CALLOUTCOST, CALLINCOST, CALLTVCOST, TOTALCOST, CALLOUTRCVCOST, CALLINRCVCOST, CALLTVRCVCOST, CALLOUTGIVCOST, CALLINGIVCOST, CALLTVGIVCOST, RCVCOST, GIVCOST, NETCALLOUTCOST, NETCALLINCOST, NETCALLTVCOST, NETTOTALCOST, TOPGID, ALLOCRETURN, ALLOCVICE, ALLOCRECALL FROM WEBTV.EB_SALES_REL_TELALLOC_STAT where Statdate = to_date(#{sDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and UserId <> 0
SELECT * FROM WEBTV.EB_PERSON_PRESALE_NEW_DETAIL where LOGTIME >= #{sDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and ROWNUM<30000
SELECT * FROM WEBTV.EB_REL_PERSON_NERVE where CREATETIME >= #{sDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and ROWNUM<30000
